item.title: 01/12/20 - Code Size Meeting
item.description: 01/12/20 - Code Size Meeting ZFinx Notes Jiawei had some issues with some arithmetic instructions (fsqrt, fmin, fmax), an error about ‘unsatisfied constraints’

item.title: 20/11/20 - Code Size Meeting
item.description: 20/11/20 - Code Size Meeting (By “he” I think I mean Jiawei) He needs to add tests to the GAS testsuite for RISC-V, testing boundary conditions and pattern match the binaries.

item.title: 2022-08-02-cobra-report
item.description: Assembler Support for the CORE-V Zc* Extension - Report 2nd of August 2022 The Zc* extensions are being carefully tested and the testsuite for Zc* has been expanded.

item.title: 2022-08-08-cobra-report
item.description: Assembler Support for the CORE-V Zc* Extension - Report Completed Last Week Verified Zc* with the GNU assembler (gas).

item.title: Titan Simulator Meeting
item.description: 05/08/21 - Titan Simulator Meeting The source code is in the LLVM project: BSCSimulator.cpp. Central to this is the include file: BSCGenRegisterInfo.

item.title: University of Bologna Meeting
item.description: University of Bologna Meeting They seem to be working on Immediate Branching I reported that we finished all testing Just Nazareno showed up.
